name: ngptps

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c0, cms))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ NrmGrp, c0 ∈ TopSp, c0 ∈ MetSp)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, cms))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ MetSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cngp), wcel(c0, ctps))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cms), wcel(c0, ctps))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmGrp → c0 ∈ TopSp)
⊣ (c0 ∈ MetSp → c0 ∈ TopSp)

comment: A normed group is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 5-Oct-2015.)
